# Interactive HIV in Pregnancy Clinical Decision Support Tool I'll create an interactive HTML page that implements a clinical decision-making algorithm based on the provided HIV in pregnancy guidelines. The page will have a two-column layout with questions on the left and dynamic guidance on the right. ```html HIV in Pregnancy Clinical Decision Support Tool
